Text: i'm guessing this one has Russian only audio just like the other torrent on here....
retract my previous statement.  Unlike the other HD DVD upload of this movie, this one has English audio.

I got this version first, however it is more of a tv rip due to the haze overlaying most of the video.  With its bitrate it would not occur if the movie were from a true dvd source.
Still its 1 of two best sources out right now.  Thanks for the upload.
